title: BeyondTrust Password Safe - Overview
description: - This dashboard provides insights into overall events from BeyondTrust Password Safe, including top users, events by category, top source IPs, and distribution by geolocation.

definition.content:
**BeyondTrust Password Safe** is a privileged access management solution that securely stores, manages, and rotates privileged credentials (like administrative or root passwords) used to access critical systems. It automates password rotation and provides comprehensive session monitoring and recording to help organizations maintain strict control over privileged credentials.

This dashboard provides insights into overall events from BeyondTrust Password Safe, including top users, events by category, top source IPs, and distribution by geolocation.

For more information, see the [BeyondTrust Password Safe Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/beyondtrust_password_safe/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

**Note**
- This dashboard is populated using BeyondTrust Password Safe logs collected via the [Datadog Agent](https://docs.datadoghq.com/agent/).
- Please follow the **Agent and Event Forwarder Configuration** steps [here](/integrations/beyondtrust-password-safe) to enable log collection.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates the **BeyondTrust Password Safe** logs to detect traffic to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
